verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Not now, but in the coming years, It may be in the better land, We'll read the meaning of our tears, And there, some time, we'll understand.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: We'll catch the broken thread again, Anmd finish what we here began; Heav'n will the mysteries explain, And then, ah, then, we'll understand

verse.name: v3
v4
